title: I Wait: A Subjective Portrait of PTSD
description: "I Wait" is a philosophical exploration of Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder through the Afghan War experiences of David Bowman. In a series of subjective narratives, "I Wait" attempts to illustrate the development and progression of war-related PTSD. This work is one Soldier's portrait of the internal conflict created by war â€“ a perspective of PTSD from eyes that once witnessed and a heart that now suffers.
author: David     Bowman
